title: Import connections CSV instead of XML
author: spitty78
body_snippet: Would like to move connections back to mRemoteNG from RoyalTS but Royal will only export to CSV.  It'll take forever to try and replicate connections from one to the other.  Thoughts?

iterations.description: Current CSV import implementation relies on semicolon delimiters, which fails on standard comma-separated CSV files commonly exported by other tools.

comments.author: robertpopa22

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Current CSV import implementation relies on semicolon delimiters, which fails on standard comma-separated CSV files commonly exported by other tools.
Approach: Modify CsvConnectionsDeserializerMremotengFormat.cs to automatically detect the delimiter (comma or semicolon) from the header row before parsing.
